languages.text: "Ты поразительно легко согласился перейти на мою сторону".
"When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."
languages.original_text: "Ты поразительно легко согласился перейти на мою сторону".

traits.locale_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."
"When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."
"When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."
"When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

languages.text: «Cuando tuviste la oportunidad de unirte a mí, la aceptaste al momento. Fue una sorpresa».
languages.original_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando tuviste la oportunidad de unirte a mí, la aceptaste al momento. Fue una sorpresa».

languages.text: “我邀请你加入队伍时，你立刻就接受了，这让我很意外。”
languages.original_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

traits.locale_text: “我邀请你加入队伍时，你立刻就接受了，这让我很意外。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}と協力する機会を与えられた時、お前はすぐに了承したな。あれには驚かされたよ」
languages.original_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}と協力する機会を与えられた時、お前はすぐに了承したな。あれには驚かされたよ」

languages.text: « Quand je vous ai proposé de me suivre, vous avez sauté sur l'occasion. Je vous avoue que je ne m'y attendais pas. »
languages.original_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je vous ai proposé de me suivre, vous avez sauté sur l'occasion. Je vous avoue que je ne m'y attendais pas. »

languages.text: "Als Euch die Gelegenheit geboten wurde, Euch mir anzuschließen, habt Ihr sie sofort ergriffen. Das hat mich überrascht."
languages.original_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

traits.locale_text: "Als Euch die Gelegenheit geboten wurde, Euch mir anzuschließen, habt Ihr sie sofort ergriffen. Das hat mich überrascht."

languages.text: "Bana katılma şansı doğunca hiç tereddüt etmedin. Şaşırdım."
languages.original_text: "When given the chance to join me, you took it readily. That surprised me."

traits.locale_text: "Bana katılma şansı doğunca hiç tereddüt etmedin. Şaşırdım."
